author: Anthony Stravino
text: Has anyone had experience,or know of an agency that has given department heads the additional duties of overseeing other departments ,i.e functioning as  part time Assistant city managers in addition to their primary responsibilities. In this age of functional consolidation,our city is researching the possibility of not filling the Assistant City Managers positions and reassigning the duties to Department heads who will then oversee additional departments.Each of the newly created part time assistant managers will manage 3 departments and their own.
title: Streamlining management
